sentences.sentence: Technologies in tout le monde publications above 70% to announce in English.
sentences.translation: 全世界的科技出版物有70%以上是用英语发表。

sentences.sentence: Last year, Le Monde revamped its weekly magazine.
sentences.translation: 去年，《世界报》改版了周刊。

sentences.sentence: "Le Monde has always been a very European newspaper," he said.
sentences.translation: “《世界报》始终是一份非常欧洲化的报纸，”他说。
